abstract: The problem just under the surface at the Web 2.0 Expo in New York this week: Web users are stretched thin.
snippet: The problem just under the surface at the Web 2.0 Expo in New York this week: Web users are stretched thin.
lead_paragraph: How many more new social networking or micro-blogging or video-sharing site can one person use? Most of us don’t have time to respond to voice mail and e-mail every day, let alone check our Twitter updates and Facebook accounts and Flickr friends. And even if we have the time, do we need another site that helps us share and connect and network?

headline.main: How Many Web Services Can One Person Use?
